phrases: Why do I have to help with this crappy squid fry thing when there is all these hotties out there...?
This fried squid is so good you would sell your soul for a single bite!
You seem to be enjoying yourself, Okumura.
Well... I do not mind doing this.
There is not a single customer!
You cannot, it is for sale.
Ah, is that your new familiar cat sith?
They called this a mission so I brought him along...
But how is this a mission?
Though this is still better than looking for seaweed for anti-demon drugs.
This shop and the inn we are staying at are both run by the family of the whiskers guy's wife.
I am starting to feel like Bon and Koneko were lucky to get away with looking for ghost stones at the Tama river.
How about around there by the rocks?
Yeah, it seems quiet over there.
Guess we would need a cute sales girl to attract customers?
Maybe if Izumo helped out a bit more...
You look cute in your bikini today, too.
I helped with the squid fry already, did not I?
Or do you think that being a salesgirl suits me better?
I swam enough already, so just have your fun!
We decided to take turns, did not we?
Even this heat does not melt her.
Ah, thanks for your hard work!
I am so happy to have kind students like you.
I was trying to give you mouth-to-mouth!
You touched my breast and assaulted me, how dare you?!
You are the one to talk!
But where is your heroic savior?
Ah, you are so short that I did not notice you at all.
My dad said a guy can be small if he is big down there!
What is wrong with having a big heart?
a demon the size of a hill will appear
It is been known in these parts for a long time.
The priest of this temple drew this about 400 years ago.
The black stain in the sea is probably the ink of the squid.
But this is just a legend...
Actually, about six months ago the sea turned black,
and a man went out to the sea to face the demon.
Just our luck to run into demons even here.
Would not it be great if defeating that thing was our first mission?
Anyway, you are really a boulderhead.
You saw us coming, did not you?
Would it hurt to stand aside?
My dad said a man should always walk straight.
That is just a figure of speech.
Would not you get lost all the time if you always walked straight?
Do you guys know where the pet shop is?
The directions are written down on this...
Why do we have to show the way to a local?
Do not you always shop there?
Yeah, but my dog cannot take this heat.
Do not tell me it is usually your dog leading the way.
You really have no sense of direction.
I do not want to brag, but my dad was even worse!
He totally had no sense of direction at all.
You are always going on about your dad.
He sailed out about six months ago, and he has not come back yet.
So I am going to defeat it for sure!
Thanks for your hard work today!
Raw squid, squid ramen, squid soup...
Fermented squid and pasta with squid ink?
Umm, but... it is all squid stuff.
It might sound fishy, but lately the fishers have only caught squid.
So much that we are thinking of invading other markets with it, too.
So that is why the fried squid is not selling at all...
Well, it is a demon of the sea that spits out ink.
According to historical records from Norway, there have been cases where the whole sea turned black from the kraken's ink.
So there is only squid left in the sea because of this thing?
And if it is a kraken, how can we defeat it?
Usually the fatal verse of the demons of the sea is Ephesians 1:18.
But we have limited resources here,
and it is definitely not something a child could handle alone.
But of course, my little kitty.
Something came up, so I have to leave you for a while.
Tomorrow we will have real part-timers in the shop, so you can rest then.
He said that kitty thing again, did not he?
I forgot to say that tomorrow you will have to look after Yohei so that he will not go after the demon.
My dad always has this with him to the sea.
It works right away, just put it on the bruise.
You came here just for this?
Sorry, which way is it to my house?
That kid must have seen it, too.
I do not mind as long as he is not doing anything stupid...
I will go check him out!
After all, he saved me once...
Besides, I hate people who do not know their limits.
She says that we do not need to take over for her.
It is unusual for Izumo to care about someone so much.
Are you going to sit there on the lookout all night, too?
I will wait forever if I have to!
If it is really a demon, you will not be able do anything against it on your own!
So I am going to defeat it for sure!
You know that there are things that you cannot do alone?
Just looking at you makes me feel embarrassed.
You are a fool who does not know his place and who will only get hurt.
So you would just run away if you were about to get hurt?
My dad told me that if someone is being all negative it is because the person has no self-confidence.
They try to make others lose their way too because they are lost.
It does not matter if you lose your way, just do not lose sight of what you have decided.
I think he decided to meet that demon, and he went through with it.
So I will not hesitate either.
Just like my dad, I will...
It is not a mantra, it is a hymn!
Wait, you want to fight it?
If we let it, it might leave the sea and attack the town.
And we have to do something before that kid does!
What the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
and what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward who believe...
According to the working of his mighty power...
It does not work at all!
Can a squid hear at all?
It is fine, it has those huge ears!
Every kid knows those are fins.
It is just like a monster movie!
Cats get sick if they eat raw squid!
I have no choice, I have to...
I humbly call upon the Gods of Harvest -
This is not something a kid can handle!
Do not get in the way!
I will defeat him and avenge my dad!
The hell, at this rate I will have to...
I was looking up stuff because we would have to take special measures
if it really was a kraken, but I figured we were in no danger.
After that I did not know the way home,
so for six months I lived on uninhabited islands or drifted on my raft.
I was looking for Japan with him.
His sense of direction is even worse than mine.
Dad, was not that the enemy?
Yohei, you have to open your heart!
I understood it when I was fighting him.
His heart is just as soft as his body!
He is changed a lot for the better.
But if a man once decided to defeat...
Yohei, keep your heart as clear as raw squid!
It takes a man's courage to change your decision.
Dad, I think I have learned a lot!
Demons can have a change of heart.
I wanted to teach you that.
It was worth calling you here for.
You came to see us off?
What else could I have done?
Are you finally feeling like playing with him?
Nice, nice, you are cute, Moriyama!
Is not that skirt a bit too short?
Episode 11 szia Demon of the Depths
Kraken: A demon of the seas first spotted in the middle ages.
It looks cephaloid like a giant squid or octopus.
It destroys or capsizes ships with its powerful arms.
sei wo uke sorezore ga jinsei wo ouka
nou no black box wo shiru sore wa kou ka
you wa limit line wo subete ryouga
saa ikou ka fumidasu sore wa kyou da
yappa hibi wa ika sen kou sotsunaku konashitecha no no
stop nagare wo mikiwamena mazu mono to mo sezu ikou ze (here we go)
todokanu mono ya kagiri aru mono ni
atsuku naru mune wo osaetsukeru no wa
rikai mo sezu osaetsukeyou to shitekita
ano otonatachi to onaji jan ka yo
mune wo moyasu hi wa dare ni mo keseya shinai
sora kara furu kuroi ame ga kono mi nurashi furitomanakutomo
mada ore wa kawareru jibun de kaetemiseru
kore ga sou pride sorezore no basho de
mada mada kieru na kokoro no hi wo
mada mada ikeru zo ikeru zo
After birth, people live as they wish
They then learn the black box in their head; is that bliss?
Just cross over, beyond the line of your limit
Let us go, take a step, and I mean this minute
Life's a bitch, so if it is easy, you are doing it wrong
Stop, which way is the world going?
Then ignore it and go wherever (here we go)
There are things I could never have, things with time
Is there a reason I force my heart upon them?
I never tried to understand, I just forced it on them
I am no better than those lifeless adults
Even if it is just a pipe dream I could never have
But no one can put out the fire in my heart
The black rain may pour hard and leave me drenched
But I know I can change, I will change myself
This is my pride, what makes up my core
I will not let my fire be put out; not yet
I will keep going, and I will never stop
(Please be) Dakara moshi kono mune ga
(With me) Michi ni mayou hi ni wa
Mirai e no tobira wo hiraite hoshii
This is what they call fate.
the way we keep on shining together.
Let us keep our gazes locked
so it will not fade away.
(Please be) Maybe the day will come
(With me) that we will lose our way
while looking for the door to the future.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off
So do not let go of my hand.
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
Ready, ready, ready for the take off.
Hold on to the bonds we have
